org.hsm.controller

Interface Controller


  • public interface Controller
    Interface for controller operations.

      • crateGreenhouse

        org.hsm.model.GreenHouse crateGreenhouse(java.lang.String name,
                                       org.hsm.model.GreenHouseType greenhouseType)
        Create a new Greenhouse.
        Parameters:
        name - the name for Greenhouse
        greenhouseType - the type of greenhouse you want (watch enumeration)
        Returns:
        the Greenhouse create with the type selected

        Delete the Greenhouse actually loaded.

      • addPlants

        void addPlants(int nPlants,
             org.hsm.model.Plant plant)
        Add n plants to Greenhouse loaded.
        Parameters:
        nPlants - number of plants to insert in the Greenhouse
        plant - the type of plant to insert
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case of the plant doesn't exist

      • delPlant

        Delete plant with the ID provided in input.
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier for the plant

      • delPLants

        void delPLants(org.hsm.model.Plant plant)
        Delete all plants of the same type of plant provided in input.
        Parameters:
        plant - type of plant to be delete

      • createNewPlant

        org.hsm.model.Plant createNewPlant(java.lang.String name,
                                 int id,
                                 java.lang.String botanicalName,
                                 int ph,
                                 int brightness,
                                 int conductibility,
                                 int optimalGrowthTime,
                                 int temperature,
                                 Data life,
                                 int size,
                                 int cost)
        Create a new type of plant for the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the plant
        id - the identifier of the plant
        botanicalName - the scientific name for the plant
        ph - optimal ph for the plant
        brightness - optimal brightness for the plant
        conductibility - optimal terrain conductibility for the plant
        optimalGrowthTime - optimal Growth time for the plant
        temperature - optimal temperature for the plant
        life - the life of the plant
        size - the space occupied from the plant in the greenhouse
        cost - the cost in euro of the plant
        Returns:
        the new Plant

        Save the current Greenhouse opened in the program.

        Load a saved Greenhouse in the program.
